title: The Potential for Human-Computer Interaction and Behavioral Science
intro: Understanding human behavior is essential for designing human-computer interfaces. But there’s more to it than that: Understanding how people interact with computer interfaces can help us understand human behavior in general.
finalSummary: Understanding human behavior is essential for designing human-computer interfaces.But there’s more to it than that: Understanding how people interact with computer interfaces can help us understand human behavior in general.
